headline: Citi Stock is Tops in Banking Sector and Could Rise Another 50%, Wells Fargo Analyst Says
summary: Citi shares have gained 33% so far in 2025, the best among the 20 stocks in the KBW bank-stock index.

headline: Financial Stocks Are Trying to Break Out. It’s Only a Matter of Time.
summary: The Financial Select Sector exchange-traded fund sits at just over $52. Sellers knock it lower each time it nears its record at a bit more than $53.

headline: Citigroup (C) Upgraded to Buy: Here's What You Should Know
summary: Citigroup (C) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company's earnings prospects. This might drive the stock higher in the near term.

headline: Citi joins Goldman in asking junior bankers to reveal if they accepted other jobs

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Citigroup (C): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Citigroup (C). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?

headline: S&P 500 Signals the US Stock Rally Momentum Is Waning

headline: China Advances $167 Billion Tibetan Mega-Dam Despite Risks
